item.title: How to mount NTFS in Mac
item.description: Install FUSE FUSE for macOS allows you to extend macOS’s native file handling capabilities via third-party file systems. You could install it here. Install ntfs-3g Use brew install ntfs-3g If you run into error, Error: Could not symlink sbin/mkntfs. You need to use the absolute path to run the following function.
